div1.head: Military Orders for A. S. Pinto, October 4, 1900
div1.p:
Adjutant General's
OFFICE.
OCT 23 1900
ROLLS DIVISION.
[unclear]

ORDERS, BOOKS, BLANKS & D.C. DIV.
A. G. O.
RECD. OCT 20 1900

FROM THE NATIONAL ARCHIVES
Vol 247 A

HEADQUARTERS DEPT. OF WESTERN CUBA,
Quemados, October 4, 1900.

Leave of absence for one month is hereby granted
Acting Assistant Surgeon Alva S. Pinto, U. S. Army.

With the approval of the Division Commander, permission
is granted to go beyond the limits of the Division.
BY COMMAND OF BRIGADIER GENERAL LEE:

R. E. L. MICHIE,
Assistant Adjutant General.
